#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define _ ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define pob pop_back
#define pf push_front
#define pof pop_front
#define mp make_pair
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define bitcnt(x) __builtin_popcountll(x)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAXN 100002
#define BASE 31
typedef unsigned long long int uint64;
typedef long long int int64;
 
int main(){
	int t;
	int64 n,k;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>n>>k;
		int64 cur=(k)*(k+1);
		cur/=2;
		int lo =1 , hgh=k, ans=-1;	
		while(lo<=hgh){
			int mid=(lo+hgh);
			mid/=2;
			int64 tmp=mid;
			tmp*=(tmp-1);
			tmp/=2;
			if(cur-tmp>=n){
				ans=mid-1;
				lo=mid+1;
			}
			else{
				hgh=mid-1;
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
